name: Sark Word Game
summary:
Sark is unlike any word game you have played: a challenging addictive intergalactic brain battle you can play by yourself, with friends, and with players around the world!

25 letter cards are dealt one at a time from a 54-card deck. A player places each letter in their Sark Square (a 5x5 matrix) to form 3, 4, and 5-letter words across and down. Games last on average 5-10 minutes. A perfect score is 70 but there is no record of anyone scoring more than 60, and 50 is rare!
